name: Silicone Baking Mat, Non Stick Pastry Mat Sheet for Dough Rolling, Nonslip Fondant/Pie Crust Mat, Counter Mat Oven Liner Mat for Making Cookies Macarons Bread Baking Supplies Extra Large 26 x 16 Inch
short_description: 【FOOD GRADE REUSABLE SILICONE PASTRY SHEET】: The silicone dough rolling mat is made of top-quality premium silicone and glass fiber. It is more safer, soft, and will not fade. High temperature resistant from -40℉(-40℃) to 450℉(232℃). it will never change color or generate smell no matter how many hours you bake it!

【PREMIUM SILICONE BAKING MAT】: Mimekitchen pastry mat consists of multi-layers of silicone and fiberglass to reinforce the mat. It won’t rip or roll up at the edges, and very hard to crinkle or slide around as you roll the dough. It is more durable than regular slim pastry sheet.

【NON-STICKY PASTRY MAT】：The non-stick working surface don't need flour to prevent sticking, the dough will slide, turn and roll easily! It works for any food like cookies, pie dough, fondant, and many others! Even if grease or dough sticks to the surface, baking mat can be easily cleaned up. The non-slip bottom keeps the baking pastry mat staying in place on countertops well and won't slip and slide around.

【EASY TO CLEAN & STORE】：Even burnt sugar and fat falls off on its on, you can dump the crumbs in the trash in a snap. Just rinse the mat in warm soapy water to clean it or air drying will be enough. It is also microwave and freezer safe. After the mat is dried, simply fold it up and easy to store.

【MULTI-PURPOSE 】: The flexible, nonstick, and reusable silicone mat can be used as a pastry rolling mat, oven baking mat, countertop mat, table mat, and craft mat. This thick baking mats is more easy to store and both inches and centimeters are available on each side of the mat for the most precise measurements, and printed with good some good tips, which is a every practical design.

short_description: [PREMIUM OVEN MATS] - Our Silicone Baking Mat set features a durable 0.7 mm thickness, designed primarily for use as oven liners when baking cookies, bread, and pastries. These silicone baking mats are heat-resistant from -40°F to 446°F, offering a safe, long-lasting, and eco-friendly alternative to disposable baking paper.

[FOOD-GRADE SILICONE] - Made from premium food-grade silicone and reinforced with high-quality fiberglass, these silicone mats for baking are BPA-free, non-toxic, and odor-free. They are safe for daily use, ensuring reliable performance and peace of mind in your kitchen.

[NON-STICK PERFORMANCE] - These Baking Sheets feature an advanced non-stick surface that allows baked goods to release effortlessly. Whether you’re making cookies, cakes, or artisan bread, these baking mats eliminate the need for extra oil, butter, or parchment paper.

[EASY CLEAN & SPACE-SAVING STORAGE] - Cleaning these silicone baking mats is simple—just rinse with warm soapy water or place them in the dishwasher. Lightweight and flexible, the baking mats can be rolled up for compact storage, saving valuable cabinet space.

[VERSATILE BAKING SUPPLIES] - This Baking Supplies set includes 2 large mats (16.53 x 11.61 inches) and 1 small mat (11.81 x 8.27 inches), making it suitable for various baking tasks. Ideal for cookies, bread, pastries, and more—this set is also a thoughtful gift for home bakers and cooking enthusiasts.
PRO TIP: For optimal performance and extended product lifespan, avoid exceeding 446°F and minimize prolonged exposure to high heat.
